      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Coordinator
      Coordinator represents an autonomic controller extends AdapterRequestDispatcher and it's a coordinator who interact with other autonomic controllers and submit decisions to the AdmissionControllerCoordination he takes resources from the network and put it back to continue the cooperation with other autonomic controllers.

    • Uses of ResourceInspector in fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation.admissioncontrollercoordination

      Subclasses of ResourceInspector in fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation.admissioncontrollercoordination 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdmissionControllerCoordination
      Descriptor class This class represents the controller of the topology and the arbiter of the DataCenter in the large scale, this class supervise the passage of ApplicationVMcoordinate URIs on the network and decide when should release ApplicationVMcoordinate This component create at the beginning using all available resources ComputerAdaptable a set of ApplicationVMcoordinate and deploy it, and push their URIs on the network in order to be used by the Controller and to do cooperation between Controllers Coordinator
